page.title: 05ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: The Community Centre is in the grounds of Gellifor school.The building is built of a woodern frame with a brick base.It has windows more or less all the way round.It has a pointed roof. The floor inside is made of rubber. At one end there is a stage and there is a kitchen at the other.The Community Centre is about eight years old.The centre is used by many diffrent organizations such as the WI,Play Group,Mother and Toddler Group,the Senior Citerzens,the Parish Council, Llangynhafal Church,the P.T.A. and the youth club.The centre can hold about a hundred and twenty people.The school uses it every day for dinners,PE, services,concerts etc. There is a special committee which is responsible for deciding how the centre should be used.It is an important place in the village.
